text: mi khey prakt kæ bukhkhl dı thi xallxh thrng prathan khamphir læa khx tadsin læa kar pen na bi kæ khea læw khea klaw kæ phukhn wa than thanghlay cng pen baw khxng chan xun ca kxallxh hak tæ(kha ca klaw wa) than thanghlay cng pen phu thi phuk phanth kab phracea theid neuxngcak kar thi phwk than khey sxn khamphir læa khey suksʹa khamphir ma
